description:
Alex Dong
https://kiwi.pycon.org/schedule/presentation/125/
(Start cut of talk is correct; speaker wasn't introduced. Speaker requested all lights off for talk).

This talk gives a brief tour to the complex technical process that happens between we take a photo with our camera and the photo gets printed onto a piece of paper. Be prepared for a fun, wild and intense session!
title: Digital image processing - From atom to pixel and back
